item.title: Decoding Gujarat’s Gambhira Bridge Collapse: Why Infrastructure Warnings Went Unheard — What Needs to Change
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: A fatal collapse of the Gambhira Bridge in Gujarat's Vadodara district on July 9, 2025, killed at least 13 and exposed deep flaws in India's bridge maintenance. Here's what failed—and how future tragedies can be prevented.

item.title: Tragedy at the Tracks: Eyewitness Blames Gatekeeper in Cuddalore School Van–Train Collision
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Three children died in a tragic school van–train collision in Cuddalore after an eyewitness alleged the railway gatekeeper fell asleep, leaving the crossing open. Read about the incident, safety failures, and calls for urgent railway infrastructure reforms

item.title: Tamil Nadu Train Accident: School Van Hit by Train in Cuddalore
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: School van hit by train in Tamil Nadu's Cuddalore; 2 students dead, others injured. Unmanned railway crossing blamed for the tragic accident.

item.title: Major Shake-up in Madurai Corporation: CM Stalin Orders All Zonal Heads to Resign
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Tamil Nadu CM Stalin orders all Madurai Corporation zonal heads to resign, aiming for better governance and party discipline. Major political shake-up ahead.

item.title: Trump Declares 25% Tariffs on Japan and South Korea, Warns More Countries
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Trump announces 25% tariffs on Japan and South Korea starting August 1, urges fair trade, warns more countries may face similar actions soon.

item.title: Fake Delivery Man Attacks Woman in Pune
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Fake courier agent raped a woman in her Pune apartment after using a spray to incapacitate her, took a selfie, and threatened to return. Police search ongoing.

item.title: Fatal Accident at Chennai Ambattur Junction: Residents Demand Urgent Safety Measures
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: A woman died in a road accident at Ambattur's Vijayalakshmipuram junction on July 5, 2025. Locals demand speed breakers and urgent safety action.

item.title: Pune Courier Rape Case Update: Accused Arrested in Karve Nagar After Chilling Attack in Kondhwa
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Pune rape case update: Police arrest courier-posing attacker from Karve Nagar after shocking assault on IT professional in Kondhwa. Get full details now.

item.title: Karnataka Police Officer Resigns After Public Humiliation by CM Siddaramaiah
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Karnataka ASP Baramani resigns after CM Siddaramaiah’s public rebuke. Sparks debate over dignity, political authority, and treatment of public servants.

item.title: Why the Israel-Iran War of 2025 Affects You More Than You Think
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: The Israel-Iran war isn't just a regional conflict — it's affecting global oil prices, civilian safety, and the lives of over a crore Indians in the Middle East. Here's how this war touches everyone, including you.

item.title: Nursing Student Murdered in Madhya Pradesh Hospital
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: 18-year-old nursing student Jyoti Ahirwar was brutally murdered at Narsinghpur Hospital, MP. Caught on camera, the crime sparks outrage and demands for justice.

item.title: Kolkata Law Student Gang Rape Was pre-planned assault
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Detailed analysis of Kolkata law student gang rape case revealing pre-planned assault, political connections and systemic safety failures.

item.title: Shocking Lock-Up Death in Tamil Nadu: Ajith Kumar Allegedly Killed in Police Custody
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Shocking police brutality in Tamil Nadu: Ajith Kumar's custodial death case. Video evidence, CB-CID probe, and demands for justice. Full breakdown.

item.title: U.S. and India Race Against Time to Finalize Trade Deal Ahead of Tariff Deadline; Brazil Seeks Defense Tech Partnership
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: U.S. and India rush to finalise trade deal before July 9 tariff deadline, with agriculture as key hurdle. Meanwhile, Brazil seeks Indian defence tech, including Akash missiles and Scorpene-class submarines Upgrades. Analysis of these pivotal geopolitical moves.

item.title: Sivaganga Custodial Death: Five Policemen Arrested, Case Transferred to CB-CID
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Shocking Tamil Nadu police brutality: 25-year-old temple guard Ajith Kumar tortured to death in custody. Madras HC calls it 'murder in investigation.' 5 cops arrested, CB-CID probe ongoing. Details on the case, court reactions, and demands for justice.

item.title: Prof. Deivam Latest Interview to Reporters – About Nikita’s Scam & Ajith Kumar Custodial-Death Case
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Retired professor Deivam reveals how ex-student Nikita duped him in a cash-for-job racket—a past fraud now tied to the police-custody death of guard Ajith Kumar.

item.title: Telangana Chemical Factory Blast Leaves 15 Dead, Dozens Injured in in Sangareddy Industrial Disaster
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Breaking news on the catastrophic chemical factory blast in Telangana's Sangareddy district. Latest updates on casualties, government response, and safety violations. 15+ death and dozens injured.

item.title: Maharashtra Government Withdraws Hindi Mandate in Schools Amid Backlash
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Maharashtra scraps Hindi as mandatory third language in schools after public backlash. New expert committee to review NEP implementation amid rising language identity debates.

item.title: The Tragic Fall of an Instagram Star into an Indonesian Volcano
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Brazilian influencer Juliana Martins dies in Mount Rinjani fall. Details on the failed rescue operation, family's allegations, and the risks of adventure tourism.

item.title: Trump Targets Trade Barriers: India Deal Floated, Canada Talks Frozen
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Donald Trump announces major trade policy shifts: India deal deadline flexible, Canada talks halted over digital tax. Analysis of potential economic impacts and negotiation strategies.

item.title: Operation SINDHU: Over 4,400 Indians Evacuated from Conflict Zones in Iran and Israel
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: India evacuates 4,415 people from Iran and Israel under Operation SINDHU. Latest flight brings 173 citizens home, including OCI cardholders and foreign nationals.

item.title: Ukraine Endures Deadliest Aerial Onslaught in Years as Russia Unleashes Over 500 Strikes
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Russia launches its largest aerial attack on Ukraine in 4 years, deploying 537 drones & missiles. A Ukrainian F-16 pilot dies heroically after downing 7 targets. Read the latest on escalating warfare, civilian toll, and global response.

item.title: Kolkata Law Student Gang-Raped Inside College: Political Heat Follows Swift Arrests
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Kolkata law college gang rape: 3 arrested, including ex-student with political links. Medical evidence confirms assault as case sparks political storm and campus safety debates.

item.title: UK F-35B Jet Stranded in Thiruvananthapuram: British Engineers Begin Urgent Repairs
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: UK F-35B stealth fighter remains grounded in Thiruvananthapuram after emergency landing. British technical team deployed for repairs as India-UK defense cooperation continues.

item.title: Trump Announces Ceasefire Deal Between Iran and Israel Amid Escalating Tensions
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Donald Trump announces Iran-Israel ceasefire, but missile strikes continue. Conflicting signals emerge as global markets react cautiously. Latest updates on Middle East tensions.

item.title: Qatar Warns of Retaliation After Iranian Missile Strikes on U.S. Base
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Qatar condemns Iranian missile strikes on its soil as 'sovereignty violation,' threatens equivalent

item.title: West Asia Conflict Deepens: Is India Ready for an Oil Crisis?
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: India faces oil supply risks as West Asia conflict escalates. With 40% of imports from the region, India bolsters Russian oil purchases and strategic reserves to counter potential Strait of Hormuz disruptions.

item.title: US Strikes Iran's Nuclear Sites: A Trigger for Global Nuclear Fallout?
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: US airstrikes target Iran's nuclear facilities - Fordow, Natanz & Isfahan. Analysis of potential radioactive fallout, global oil market impacts, and India's delicate diplomatic balancing act amid escalating tensions.

item.title: U.S. Strikes on Iran's Nuclear Facilities May Have Limited Impact, Say Intelligence Sources
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: U.S. intelligence suggests Iran's nuclear program delayed only months by recent strikes, contradicting Trump administration's 'obliterated' claims. Pentagon disputes assessment as tensions rise.

item.title: Kuwait Temporarily Shuts Down Airspace Amid Rising Regional Tensions
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Kuwait closes airspace amid Middle East tensions as Iran targets US bases. Critical aviation corridor shutdown impacts global flights and signals regional escalation. Latest updates on Gulf security crisis.
